item.title: Interface Creation/Manipulation
item.dc:creator: @Ike_TeeHee Ike TeeHee
item.description:
@Ike_TeeHee wrote:

When I right click a button, i get two options.

Rock Crabzzzz…
and of course, Close

//Control 19808 (6) intteleports2.anIntArray240[7] = 19808; intteleports2.anIntArray241[7] = 4; intteleports2.anIntArray272[7] = 50; //Button addActionButton(19808, 78, 60, "Rock Crabzzzz", "button 772"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text

I was wondering if someone could help me figure out how to add more options to a single drop down menu

Thanks!

Read full topic
